headline: Is Electronic Arts (EA) Still Fairly Valued After Its Recent Share Price Rally?
summary: Electronic Arts (EA) has quietly become one of 2024’s steadier gaming stocks, with shares near all time highs after a strong run this year and solid improvement in both revenue and earnings. See our latest analysis for Electronic Arts. At around $203.66 per share, EA’s momentum has been driven less by short term excitement and more by a steady re rating, with a strong 90 day share price return feeding into an impressive three year total shareholder return and signalling that investors are...
